title: Brand New 3 Bedroom Apartment
details:
This is a Brand New 3 Bedroom Apartment with 2 Toilets, Living ,& Pantry.

Square feet area - 1176
Located in 1st Floor

Situated in Ayurveda Road, Pallekele, Kandy.

500mtrs from the Main road.

Other Amneties- 24hr Security, Parking, Swimming Pool, Gym & Club House.
Developer - Prime Lands

Marked Price by Developer - 13.8 Mn
